name: Median income single filer
description: Single person earning £50,000 - typical middle-income scenario at upper basic rate

sources.description: Verified using online UK tax calculator for 2025/26
sources.notes: Personal allowance: £12,570, Taxable: £37,430, Income tax (20%): £7,486, NI main band (8%): £2,994, Total deductions: £10,480, Net: £39,520
